name: Swamp Quest
description:
A quest. A swamp. And a whole lot of fish.

In this, retro, top down action-rpg your reflexes will be put to the test, and only the greatest of champions will emerge victorious in the battle against the creatures of the swamp. Take the role as an aspiring knight and go on a journey for fame and fortune, and most importantly; your Knighthood!

Can you complete the king's quest, and earn the title of Knight of the Swamp?

This is a student exam project made by three Game & Interaction batchelor students at KADK located in Copenhagen. The developers are;

Anders Christian Larsson

Sejr Thomsen (ergi)

Eva Marie Lock-Lorenzen
